item.title: CVE-2023-34013|2023-11-13T02:28:32.010Z -- poll%20maker%20team -- poll%20maker%20%E2%80%93%20best%20wordpress%20poll%20plugin
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Poll Maker Team Poll Maker – Best WordPress Poll Plugin.This issue affects Poll Maker – Best WordPress Poll Plugin: from n/a through 4.6.2.
